Developing SMALÂ¶

SMAL is open source software and it is free for anyone to use.

We are using git and github to keep track of changes to the code base. The main repository for the code is here. To participate in development, please fork this repo and submit pull requests, as explained on this page.

If you are having issues using the code, have discovered a bug that you would like to report, or if you would like to propose new features, please post an issue on this page.
